text: Burak Dakak (born 8 June 1998) is a Turkish actor. ==Biography== Burak Dakak was born on 18 June 1998 in Ankara. He started his acting career at the age of 10. In 2008, he started playing the role of Servet in Doğruluk Ekseni. In 2009, he appeared as young Mert in Ezel his other projects were Geniş Aile, Benim Adım Gültepe, Muhteşem Yüzyıl: Kösem, Umuda Kelepçe Vurulmaz and Diriliş: Ertuğrul has appeared in such series. He studied at Bahçeşehir University – Cinema and Theatre (Bahçeşehir Üniversitesi Sinema ve Televizyon Bölümü).
